abilities.name: Deathbringer Stance
abilities.description: Aatrox deals bonus damage on his next attack, healing for the damage dealt.

abilities.name: The Darkin Blade
abilities.description: Aatrox slams his greatsword down, dealing physical damage. He can swing three times, each with a different area of effect.
abilities.active: Aatrox slams his greatsword down, dealing 10/30/50/70/90 physical damage. The Darkin Blade may be re-cast 2 additional times, each one increasing in damage.Each strike can hit with the Edge, briefly knocking enemies up and dealing more damage.

abilities.name: Infernal Chains
abilities.description: Aatrox smashes the ground, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. Champions and large monsters have to leave the impact area quickly or they will be dragged to the center and take the damage again.
abilities.active: Aatrox smashes the ground, dealing 30/40/50/60/70 physical damage to the first enemy hit and slowing by 25% for 1.5 s.Champions or Large Monsters have 1.5 s to leave the impact area or be dragged back and damaged again.

abilities.name: Umbral Dash
abilities.description: Passively, Aatrox heals when damaging enemy champions. On activation, he dashes in a direction.
abilities.active: Aatrox dashes in a direction.
abilities.passive: Aatrox heals for 20/22.5/25/27.5/30% of damage he deals to champions.

abilities.name: World Ender
abilities.description: Aatrox unleashes his demonic form, fearing nearby enemy minions and gaining attack damage, increased healing, and movement speed. If he gets a takedown, this effect is extended, and he revives upon taking lethal damage.
abilities.active: Aatrox reveals his true demonic form for 10 seconds. On activation, he fears nearby enemy minions and gains Movement Speed, decaying over the duration. While World Ender persists, he gains 20/25/30% Attack Damage and increases self healing by 40/55/70%.On enemy champion takedown, World Ender is extended and Aatrox will Revive if he takes lethal damage.

abilities.name: Vastayan Grace
abilities.description: Whenever Ahri's spells hit a champion 2 times within a short period, she briefly gains movement speed.

abilities.name: Orb of Deception
abilities.description: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back. After earning several spell hits, Ahri's next orb hits will restore her health.
abilities.active: Deals 40/65/90/115/140 (+35% Ability Power) magic damage on the way out, and 40/65/90/115/140 (+35% Ability Power) true damage on the way back.Casting Orb of Deception builds stacks. At 0 stacks, Ahri's next Orb of Deception will restore 0 (+0) health for each enemy hit.

abilities.name: Fox-Fire
abilities.description: Ahri releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
abilities.active: Releases fox-fires that seek nearby enemies and deal 40/65/90/115/140 (+30% Ability Power) magic damage.Enemies hit with multiple fox-fires take 30% damage from each additional fox-fire beyond the first, for a maximum of 0 damage to a single enemy.Fox-fire prioritizes champions recently hit by Charm, then enemies Ahri recently attacked.If Fox-fire cannot find a priority target, it targets champions over the nearest enemy if possible.

abilities.name: Charm
abilities.description: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, causing them to walk harmlessly towards her and take more damage from her abilities.
abilities.active: Blows a kiss dealing 60/90/120/150/180 (+40% Ability Power) magic damage and charms an enemy causing them to walk harmlessly towards Ahri for 1.4/1.55/1.7/1.85/2 second(s).Enemies hit by Charm become vulnerable for 5 seconds, taking 20% more damage from Ahri's abilities.

abilities.name: Spirit Rush
abilities.description: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.
abilities.active: Nimbly dashes forward firing 3 essence bolts at nearby enemies (prioritizing champions) dealing 60/90/120 magic damage.Can be cast up to 3 times within 10 seconds before going on cooldown.

abilities.name: Assassin's Mark
abilities.description: Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next autoattack with bonus range and damage.

abilities.name: Five Point Strike
abilities.description: Akali throws out five kunai, dealing damage based on her bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power and slowing.
abilities.active: Slings kunai in an arc, dealing 25/50/75/100/125 magic damage. Enemies at the tip are briefly slowed.At max rank, deals 133% damage to minions and monsters.

abilities.name: Twilight Shroud
abilities.description: Akali drops a cover of smoke. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes invisible and unable to be selected by enemy spells and attacks and gains Movement Speed. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.
abilities.active: Drops a smoke bomb, unleashing a spreading cover of smoke lasting 5/5.5/6/6.5/7 seconds.The smoke obscures Akali from enemy vision and grants her 20/25/30/35/40% movement speed.Entering or exiting obscured extends Shroud's duration.

abilities.name: Shuriken Flip
abilities.description: Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing physical damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing additional damage.
abilities.active: Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing 80/115/150/185/220 physical damage and marking the first enemy or smoke cloud hit. Re-cast: Dash to the marked target, dealing 50/80/110/140/170 physical damage.

abilities.name: Perfect Execution
abilities.description: Akali leaps in a direction, stunning and damaging enemies she strikes. Re-cast: Akali dashes in a direction, executing all enemies she strikes.
abilities.active: Two dashes: The first vaults over enemies, micro-stunning and dealing 85/150/215 physical damage. Akali can dash again after 2.5 seconds.The second is a piercing thrust that executes, dealing 85/150/215 to 255/450/645 magic damage based on missing health.

abilities.name: Triumphant Roar
abilities.description: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself and all nearby allied champions.

abilities.name: Pulverize
abilities.description: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air.
abilities.active: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing 60/105/150/195/240 (+50% Ability Power) magic damage and tossing nearby enemy units into the air for 1 second.

abilities.name: Headbutt
abilities.description: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back.
abilities.active: Alistar rams into an enemy, dealing 55/110/165/220/275 (+70% Ability Power) magic damage and knocking them back.

abilities.name: Trample
abilities.description: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit collision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.
abilities.active: Alistar tramples the ground, ignoring unit collision and dealing 0 (+0) magic damage over 5 seconds to nearby enemies. Each pulse that damages at least one enemy champion grants Alistar a Trample stack.At 5 Trample stacks Alistar empowers his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal an additional 0 magic damage and stun for 1 second.

abilities.name: Unbreakable Will
abilities.description: Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.
abilities.active: Removes all disables from Alistar. For 7 seconds Alistar takes 55/65/75% reduced physical and magical damage.

abilities.name: Cursed Touch
abilities.description: Amumu's basic attacks Curse enemies for 3 seconds, causing them to take 10% bonus true damage from any magic damage dealt to them.

abilities.name: Bandage Toss
abilities.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
abilities.active: Launches a bandage in a direction. If it hits an enemy unit, Amumu pulls himself to them, dealing 80/130/180/230/280 (+70% Ability Power) magic damage and stunning for 1 second.

abilities.name: Despair
abilities.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their Curses refreshed.
abilities.active: Toggle: Amumu cries, refreshing Curses on nearby enemies and dealing magic damage equal to 10/15/20/25/30 plus 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 (+1% Ability Power)% of their maximum health each second.

abilities.name: Tantrum
abilities.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
abilities.active: Amumu tantrums, dealing 75/100/125/150/175 (+50% Ability Power) magic damage to surrounding units. Basic attacks that hit Amumu reduce Tantrum's cooldown by 0.5 seconds.Tantrum's passive effect increases in potency with bonus Armor and Magic Resist.

abilities.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
abilities.description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his Curse, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.
abilities.active: Amumu entangles nearby enemy units, dealing 150/250/350 magic damage and applying Curse. Entangled enemies are unable to attack or move for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Rebirth
abilities.description: Upon dying, Anivia will revert into an egg. If the egg can survive for six seconds, she is gloriously reborn.

abilities.name: Flash Frost
abilities.description: Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.
abilities.active: A massive chunk of ice flies toward target location, dealing 60/85/110/135/160 (+45% Ability Power) magic damage. At the end of its range or if Anivia activates the spell again, the missile detonates, doing 60/85/110/135/160 (+45% Ability Power) magic damage in a small area and stunning units for 1.1/1.2/1.3/1.4/1.5 seconds.Enemies damaged by Flash Frost are also slowed by [0]% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Crystallize
abilities.description: Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.
abilities.active: Anivia summons an impassable wall of ice 400/500/600/700/800 units wide, blocking all movement. The wall lasts for 5 seconds before it melts.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.description: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing a low amount of damage. If the target was recently stunned by Flash Frost or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, the damage they take is doubled.
abilities.active: Anivia blasts her target with a freezing wind, dealing 50/75/100/125/150 (+50% Ability Power) magic damage. If a target was recently stunned by Anivia or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, they take double damage.

abilities.name: Glacial Storm
abilities.description: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.
abilities.active: Drains 40/50/60 Mana per second. Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail that increases in size over 1.5 seconds, dealing 40/60/80 magic damage per second to targets and slowing their Movement Speed by 20/30/40%. When the Glacial Storm is fully formed, it slows targets' Movement Speed by 30/45/60% and does 300% damage instead.

abilities.name: Pyromania
abilities.description: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target for a short duration.

abilities.name: Disintegrate
abilities.description: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.
abilities.active: Deals 80/115/150/185/220 (+80% Ability Power) magic damage. Mana cost and half the cooldown are refunded if Disintegrate kills the target.

abilities.name: Incinerate
abilities.description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
abilities.active: Casts a cone of fire dealing 70/115/160/205/250 (+85% Ability Power) magic damage to all enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Molten Shield
abilities.description: Grants Annie and Tibbers increased percentage Damage Resist and damages enemies who attack with basic attacks.
abilities.active: Annie grants herself and Tibbers 16/22/28/34/40% damage reduction for 3 seconds.While the shield is active, enemies who basic attack it take 20/30/40/50/60 (+20% Ability Power) magic damage.

abilities.name: Summon: Tibbers
abilities.description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
abilities.active: Summons Tibbers, dealing 150/275/400 (+65% Ability Power) magic damage to enemies in the target area. For the next 45 seconds, Tibbers burns nearby enemies for 10/15/20 (+10% Ability Power) per second and attacks for 50/75/100 (+10.66% Ability Power) as magic damage. Annie can control Tibbers by reactivating this ability. Tibbers Enrages when: summoned; Annie uses Pyromania on an enemy Champion; and when Annie dies. Enrages: Tibbers gains 275% Attack Speed and 100% Movement Speed, decaying over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Frost Shot
abilities.description: Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets. Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.

abilities.name: Ranger's Focus
abilities.description: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.
abilities.active: For 4 seconds, Ashe gains 20/25/30/35/40% Attack Speed, and her basic attacks fire a flurry of arrows dealing 0 physical damage. During this time, she does not stack Focus. Ranger's Focus applies Frost Shot.
abilities.passive: Basic attacks grant Focus for 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times. Stacks fall off one at a time, and at 4 stacks, Ranger's Focus can be cast, consuming all Focus.

abilities.name: Volley
abilities.description: Ashe fires 9 arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot.
abilities.active: Fires arrows in a cone, each dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage. Enemies can block multiple arrows, but only take damage from the first.Champion hits count as Critical Strikes for the purposes of Frost Shot.

abilities.name: Hawkshot
abilities.description: Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map.
abilities.active: Reveals terrain as it flies toward target location anywhere on the map. Grants vision for 5 seconds. Ashe can store up to 2 charges of Hawkshot.Hawkshot grants Ashe assists on enemy champions that it reveals - but only if they were otherwise unseen.

abilities.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
abilities.description: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy Champion, it deals damage and stuns the Champion, stunning for longer the farther arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed.
abilities.active: Launches a crystal arrow of ice that stuns the first enemy Champion hit, dealing {{ rmaindamage }} magic damage. The farther the arrow flies, the longer the stun, up to {{ maxstunduration }} seconds. Surrounding enemies take half damage.

abilities.name: Center of the Universe
abilities.description: Stars orbit Aurelion Sol, dealing magic damage when they hit an enemy.

abilities.name: Starsurge
abilities.description: Aurelion Sol creates an expanding disk, which explodes to stun and damage enemies when it moves too far away from him.
abilities.active: First Press: Aurelion Sol creates a new stellar core, which grows over time and grants him 10% Movement Speed.The core will detonate when it reaches his Outer Limit, applying 70/110/150/190/230 (+65% Ability Power) magic damage and stunning enemies for {{ effect4amount*.333 }} to 1.65/1.8/1.95/2.1/2.25 second(s) based on size. Second Press: Detonate the core early.

abilities.name: Celestial Expansion
abilities.description: Aurelion Sol pushes his stars farther out, magnifying their damage.
abilities.active: Toggle: Aurelion Sol's Stars orbit at his Outer Limit and deal 150% damage, for a total of 0 (+0) magic damage.

abilities.name: Comet of Legend
abilities.description: Aurelion Sol gains speed while moving in one continuous direction, and can take off flying for a long distance.
abilities.active: Fly for 3000/4000/5000/6000/7000 units in the chosen direction. Only castable outside of combat. Aurelion Sol can see and be seen over walls while flying.Taking champion or turret damage will force a landing and reset the passive movement speed.
abilities.passive: Continuously moving in one direction grants increasing Movement Speed up to 25/30/35/40/45%.

abilities.name: Voice of Light
abilities.description: Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure starfire, damaging and slowing all enemies caught in it and knocking nearby enemies back to a safer distance.
abilities.active: Breathes out a blast of pure starfire, dealing 150/250/350 (+70% Ability Power) magic damage and slowing by 40/50/60% for 2 seconds. The blast will also knock nearby enemies back to Aurelion Sol's Outer Limit.

abilities.name: Shurima's Legacy
abilities.description: Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets.

abilities.name: Conquering Sands
abilities.description: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.
abilities.active: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal 70/90/110/130/150 (+30% Ability Power) magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a 25% slow for 1 second.Enemies hit by multiple Sand Soldiers will not take additional damage.

abilities.name: Arise!
abilities.description: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line. Arise! also passively grants attack speed to Azir and his Sand Soldiers.
abilities.active: Azir summons a Sand Soldier for 10 seconds. When Azir attacks an enemy in a soldier's range, the soldier attacks in his stead, stabbing the target for 0 (+60% Ability Power) magic damage. Other enemies caught in the soldier's attack take [0]% of the stab's damage.Azir stores up to {{ maxammo }} Sand Soldiers and prepares a new one every 0 seconds.Sand Soldiers that strike the same targets deal 25% damage after the first.Sand Soldiers can attack targets outside of Azir's basic attack range.Sand Soldiers expire twice as fast when near an enemy turret.
abilities.passive: Azir gains 20/30/40/50/60% attack speed. When Azir has 3 or more Sand Soldiers, he gains 20/30/40/50/60% additional attack speed for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Shifting Sands
abilities.description: Azir shields himself briefly and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he instantly readies a new Sand Soldier for deployment and halts his dash.
abilities.active: Azir shields himself for 1.5 seconds, blocking up to 80/120/160/200/240 (+70% Ability Power) damage and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies hit for 60/90/120/150/180 (+40% Ability Power) magic damage.If Azir hits an enemy champion, he halts his dash and instantly prepares a new Sand Soldier.

abilities.name: Emperor's Divide
abilities.description: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.
abilities.active: Azir summons a wall of armored soldiers that charge forward, knocking back enemies and dealing 150/250/450 (+60% Ability Power) magic damage. The soldiers then remain as a wall for 3 seconds.Azir and his allies can pass freely through Emperor's Divide.Emperor's Divide does not interact with Azir's basic attacks or spells.

abilities.name: Traveler's Call
abilities.description: Bard's presence causes magical chimes to appear, which grant Bard experience, mana, and a burst of speed. Additionally, lesser spirits follow Bard and aid in his attacks - collecting chimes causes these meeps to gain power over the course of the game.

abilities.name: Cosmic Binding
abilities.description: Bard fires a missile which will slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wall, it will stun the initial target; if it strikes another enemy, it will stun them both.
abilities.active: Bard fires an energy bolt, dealing 80/125/170/215/260 (+65% Ability Power) magic damage to one or two enemies. The first target hit will be slowed by 60% for 1/1.2/1.4/1.6/1.8 second(s).If the bolt hits another enemy or a wall, any enemies hit are stunned for 1/1.2/1.4/1.6/1.8 second(s).

abilities.name: Caretaker's Shrine
abilities.description: Reveals a healing shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing the first ally that touches it.
abilities.active: Bard raises a health shrine that immediately offers 30/60/90/120/150 (+30% Ability Power) health, but restores up to 70/110/150/190/230 (+60% Ability Power) health as it gathers power for 10 seconds. The shrine's effect also grants 50% decaying movement speed for 1.5 seconds. Bard can have up to 3 shrines active at once, which remain until visited by an ally champion or crushed by an enemy champion.

abilities.name: Magical Journey
abilities.description: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal.
abilities.active: Bard opens a one-way corridor through nearby terrain. Both allies and enemies can use the corridor by right-clicking on any part of it while near its entrance, with allies travelling 10/20/30/40/50% faster than enemies.The corridor disappears after 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Tempered Fate
abilities.description: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.
abilities.active: Bard sends magical energy arcing to a target location. On impact, all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets in the target area are put in stasis, becoming invincible, untargetable, and unable to act for {{ rstasisduration }} seconds.Epic monsters are also put into stasis, despite normally being immune to disables.

abilities.name: Mana Barrier
abilities.description: When Blitzcrank's life is brought below 20% health, he activates Mana Barrier. This creates a mana shield equal to 30% of his mana for 10 seconds. Mana Barrier can only occur once every 90 seconds.

abilities.name: Rocket Grab
abilities.description: Blitzcrank fires his right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to him.
abilities.active: Blitzcrank fires his right hand. If it encounters an enemy unit it will stun them and deal 80/135/190/245/300 (+100% Ability Power) magic damage while he pulls them to himself.

abilities.name: Overdrive
abilities.description: Blitzcrank super charges himself to get dramatically increased Movement and Attack Speed. He is temporarily slowed after the effect ends.
abilities.active: Blitzcrank supercharges himself, gaining [{{ initialms }}]% Movement Speed and 30/38/46/54/62% Attack Speed for 5 seconds. The Movement Speed bonus decays over the duration.When Overdrive ends, Blitzcrank's Movement Speed is slowed by 30% for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Power Fist
abilities.description: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double damage and pop his target up in the air.
abilities.active: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double his total attack damage as physical damage and pop his target up in the air.

abilities.name: Static Field
abilities.description: Enemies attacked by Blitzcrank are marked and take lightning damage after 3 seconds. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to damage nearby enemies and silence them for 0.5 seconds.
abilities.active: Deals {{ activedamage }} magic damage and silences surrounding enemy units for 0.5 seconds.
abilities.passive: While this spell is available, lightning charges Blitzcrank's fists, marking enemies. After 1 second, they are shocked for {{ passivedamage }} magic damage. This stacks up to two times.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Brand's abilities set his targets Blaze ablaze for 4 seconds, damaging them for 3% of their maximum health over 3.25 seconds as Magic damage magic damage. Abilities used on an ablazed target are empowered and apply other stacks of blaze while also refreshing the duration of the previous ones. A target can have up to 3 blaze stacks at the same time and the damage per tick against monsters is capped at 80. After reaching 3 stacks on large monsters and enemy champions, an area is marked around them, which explodes after 2 seconds, consuming all the stacks. All enemies struck are dealt 12% − 16% (based on level) (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of their maximum health as magic damage and are applied a stack of blaze. The explosion will still trigger if the target dies to the third ability or during the delay.

abilities.name: Sear
abilities.description: Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 1.5 seconds.
abilities.active: Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals 80/110/140/170/200 (+55% Ability Power) magic damage.
abilities.passive: If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Pillar of Flame
abilities.description: After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.
abilities.active: After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a location, dealing 75/120/165/210/255 (+60% Ability Power) magic damage to enemies.
abilities.passive: Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage from Pillar of Flame.

abilities.name: Conflagration
abilities.description: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing magic damage to them. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.
abilities.active: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing 70/95/120/145/170 (+45% Ability Power) magic damage.
abilities.passive: If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Pyroclasm
abilities.description: Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing magic damage each time it bounces, up to 5 bounces. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them.
abilities.active: Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage each time it bounces up to 5 bounces. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions.
abilities.passive: If the target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow the target by [{{ slowamount }}]%.

abilities.name: Concussive Blows
abilities.description: Braum adds stacks of Concussive Blows to enemies with basic attacks or Winter's Bite. He and his allies continue to add stacks with basic attacks, at 4 stacks their target will be stunned.

abilities.name: Winter's Bite
abilities.description: Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage. Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.
abilities.active: Braum propels freezing ice from his shield dealing 60/105/150/195/240 (+0) [2.5% of Braum's Max Health] magic damage to the first enemy hit and slowing them by 70%, decaying over the next 2 seconds.Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.

abilities.name: Stand Behind Me
abilities.description: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds.
abilities.active: Braum leaps to target allied champion or minion.On arrival, Braum and the ally gain 0 Armor and 0 Magic Resist (10/14/18/22/26 plus 10/11.5/13/14.5/16% of Braum's bonus Armor/Magic Resist) for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Unbreakable
abilities.description: Braum raises his shield in a direction for several seconds, intercepting all projectiles causing them to hit him and be destroyed. He negates the damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this direction.
abilities.active: Braum reduces incoming damage and blocks for allies behind him.Braum raises his shield in a direction for 3/3.25/3.5/3.75/4 seconds negating the damage of the next attack from that direction. Subsequent attacks deal 30/32.5/35/37.5/40% reduced damage.Braum intercepts projectiles, causing them to hit him and be destroyed.Braum gains 10% Movement Speed for the duration.

abilities.name: Glacial Fissure
abilities.description: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.
abilities.active: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line for {{ slowzoneduration }} seconds, slowing enemies above it by {{ movespeedmod }}%.Enemies hit take {{ totaldamage }} magic damage. The first champion hit is knocked up for {{ firstknockupduration }} seconds, subsequent enemies are knocked up briefly.

abilities.name: Headshot
abilities.description: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.

abilities.name: Piltover Peacemaker
abilities.description: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).
abilities.active: Revs the rifle for 1 second to fire a narrow piercing shot dealing 50/90/130/170/210 (+0) physical damage. After hitting any target, it opens into a wider shot that deals 40% less damage. Always deals full damage to trap revealed targets.

abilities.name: Yordle Snap Trap
abilities.description: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds.
abilities.active: Sets traps that an enemy Champion can spring, immobilizing them for 1.5 seconds and granting True Sight for a short duration.Traps last for 30/35/40/45/50 seconds. 3/3/4/4/5 traps may be active at once.Trapped enemies take an additional 60/105/150/195/240 (+0) increased damage from Headshot.

abilities.name: 90 Caliber Net
abilities.description: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.
abilities.active: Fires a net, knocking Caitlyn backwards. The net deals 70/110/150/190/230 (+80% Ability Power) magic damage and slows the first enemy hit by 50% for 1 second.

abilities.name: Ace in the Hole
abilities.description: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.
abilities.active: Takes a second to line up the perfect shot on an enemy Champion at up to 0 range. The shot deals 0 (+{{ rtotaldamage }}) physical damage, but other enemy Champions can intercept it.Grants True Sight of the target during the channel.

abilities.name: Adaptive Defenses
abilities.description: Basic attacks on champions grant a shield equal to 20% of Camille's maximum health against their damage type (Physical or Magic) for a brief duration.

abilities.name: Precision Protocol
abilities.description: Camille's next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus movement speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if Camille delays a period of time between the two attacks.
abilities.active: Camille's next basic attack deals 0 bonus physical damage and increases her movement speed by 20/25/30/35/40% for 1 second. This ability can be recast in the next [object Object] seconds at no cost.If the second Precision Protocol attack hits at least 1.5 seconds after the first, the bonus damage is increased by 100% to 0 and [0]% of the attack is converted into true damage.Precision Protocol cannot critically strike.

abilities.name: Tactical Sweep
abilities.description: Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille.
abilities.active: Camille winds up and then slices in a direction, dealing 70/100/130/160/190 (+0) physical damage to enemies hit.Enemies hit by the outer half are slowed by 80%, decaying over 2 seconds. They take extra physical damage equal to 6/6.5/7/7.5/8% (+[0]%) of their maximum health, and Camille heals for 100% of the bonus damage dealt to champions.Tactical Sweep does 50% less damage to non-epic monsters.

abilities.name: Hookshot
abilities.description: Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemy champions upon landing.
abilities.active: First Cast: Fire a hookshot that attaches to terrain, pulling Camille to it and allowing Hookshot to be recast for 1 second. Second Cast: Camille leaps from the wall, colliding with the first enemy champion hit. Upon landing, she deals 60/95/130/165/200 (+0) physical damage to enemies and stuns nearby enemy champions for 0.75 seconds. Dashes towards enemy champions travel twice as far and grant 40/50/60/70/80% attack speed for 5 seconds on impact.

abilities.name: The Hextech Ultimatum
abilities.description: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.
abilities.active: Camille briefly becomes untargetable and leaps onto an enemy champion, interrupting channels and locking them into an area they cannot escape by any means for {{ rduration }} seconds. Other nearby enemies are knocked away. Her basic attacks against the trapped enemy deal bonus magic damage equal to {{ ronhitdamage }} plus {{ rpercentcurrenthpdamage }}% of their current health.The Hextech Ultimatum ends if Camille leaves the area.

abilities.name: Serpentine Grace
abilities.description: Cassiopeia gains Movement Speed per level, but she cannot purchase Boots items.

abilities.name: Noxious Blast
abilities.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.
abilities.active: Blasts enemies in an area with Noxious Poison. If a champion is hit, Cassiopeia gains 30/35/40/45/50% Movement Speed decaying over 3 seconds.Noxious Poison deals 75/110/145/180/215 (+90% Ability Power) magic damage over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Miasma
abilities.description: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities.
abilities.active: Cassiopeia spews venom in an arc, leaving toxic clouds for 5 seconds.Enemies in the clouds are continually afflicted with Debilitating Poison, inflicting a decaying 40/50/60/70/80% slow and grounding them, prohibiting the use of Movement abilities. They also take 20/25/30/35/40 (+15% Ability Power) magic damage per second.Miasma has a minimum cast range.

abilities.name: Twin Fang
abilities.description: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.
abilities.active: Deal 55% Ability Power (+10% Ability Power) magic damage to a target. If the target is killed by Twin Fang, or is killed during its flight, Cassiopeia gains {{ cost }} Mana.If the victim is Poisoned when Twin Fang hits, it takes 10/30/50/70/90 (+60% Ability Power) additional magic damage and Cassiopeia heals for 0 (+0).

abilities.name: Petrifying Gaze
abilities.description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.
abilities.active: Cassiopeia deals {{ rdamage }} magic damage to all enemies in front of her. Enemies facing her turn to stone and are stunned for {{ rccduration }} seconds while enemies facing away are slowed by {{ rslowpercent }}%.

abilities.name: Carnivore
abilities.description: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.

abilities.name: Rupture
abilities.description: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.
abilities.active: Ruptures the ground at target location. Enemies caught in the rupture are launched into the air for 1 second, take 80/135/190/245/300 (+100% Ability Power) magic damage, and are slowed by 60% for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Feral Scream
abilities.description: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
abilities.active: Silences enemies in a cone for 1.6/1.7/1.8/1.9/2 seconds and deals 75/125/175/225/275 (+70% Ability Power) magic damage.

abilities.name: Vorpal Spikes
abilities.description: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.
abilities.active: Cho'Gath's next 3 basic attacks launch spikes that deal 22/34/46/58/70 (+30% Ability Power) plus [0]% of enemies' maximum Health as magic damage and slow by 30/35/40/45/50% for 1.5 seconds, decaying over the duration.Spikes grow wider as Cho'Gath gains Feast stacks.Spikes deal an additional 0.5% of enemies' maximum Health per Feast stack.Percent Health damage against minions and monsters is capped at 60/80/100/120/140.

abilities.name: Feast
abilities.description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.
abilities.active: Ravenously feed on an enemy, dealing {{ rdamage }} true damage to champions or {{ rmonsterdamage }} to minions and monsters. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath gains a stack of Feast, which causes him to grow in size and gain {{ rhealthperstack }} maximum health.Only {{ rminionmaxstacks }} total stacks can be gained from minions and non-epic monsters.

abilities.name: Hextech Munitions
abilities.description: Corki's basic attack deals a percentage of their damage as magic instead of physical. Every once in a while, The Package arrives in Corki's base to be picked up, temporarily granting him out of combat Movement Speed and upgrading Valkyrie into Special Delivery.

abilities.name: Phosphorus Bomb
abilities.description: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.
abilities.active: Corki lobs a bomb, dealing 75/120/165/210/255 (+50% bonus Attack Damage) (+50% bonus Attack Damage) magic damage to enemies in the target area. In addition, the blast reveals the area and champions hit by the blast for 6 seconds (does not reveal stealth).

abilities.name: Valkyrie
abilities.description: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.
abilities.active: Corki flies a short distance, dealing 60/90/120/150/180 (+40% Ability Power) magic damage per second to enemies in the fire left along his path. Special Delivery: Corki flies a great distance, dropping bombs that knock aside enemies and leave a burning trail for 5 seconds. The trail slows enemies by 90% and burns them for 0 (+0) (+20% Ability Power) magic damage per second.

abilities.name: Gatling Gun
abilities.description: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.
abilities.active: Corki's gatling gun fires continuously at targets in front of him for 4 seconds, dealing up to 120/170/220/270/320 (+160% bonus Attack Damage) damage and reducing up to 8/11/14/17/20 armor and magic resist.Gatling Gun's damage is 50% physical, 50% magic.Defense reductions last for 2 seconds after last being damaged by Gatling Gun.

abilities.name: Missile Barrage
abilities.description: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.
abilities.active: Corki fires a missile that explodes at the first enemy it hits, dealing {{ rsmallmissiledamage }} magic damage to all nearby enemies.Corki can store up to 7 missiles, and every 3rd missile will be a Big One, dealing {{ rbigonemultiplier*100 }}% damage ({{ rbigmissiledamage }}).

abilities.name: The Darkin Scythe
abilities.description: Kayn wields an ancient weapon and fights Rhaast, the darkin within it, for control. Either the Darkin will triumph, or Kayn will master Rhaast and become the Shadow Assassin. Darkin: Heal for a percentage of spell damage dealt to champions. Shadow Assassin: For the first few seconds in combat with enemy champions, deal bonus damage.

abilities.name: Reaping Slash
abilities.description: Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage.
abilities.active: Kayn dashes forward to strike nearby enemies. Both dash and strike deal 60/80/100/120/140 (+65% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage.
abilities.passive: Darkin: Deal a percentage of the target's maximum health instead.Deals 55 bonus physical damage to monsters.

abilities.name: Blade's Reach
abilities.description: Kayn damages and slows targets in a line.
abilities.active: Kayn deals 90/135/180/225/270 (+130% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage and slows enemies hit by 60%, decaying over the next 1.5 seconds.
abilities.passive: Shadow Assassin: Gain extra range and the ability to move during Blade's Reach. Darkin: Gain a knock up.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.description: Kayn can walk through terrain.
abilities.active: Kayn gains 40% movement speed and the ability to walk through terrain for 7/7.5/8/8.5/9 seconds. When he first enters terrain, he is healed for 100/115/130/145/160 (+40% bonus Attack Damage).
abilities.passive: Shadow Assassin: Cooldown is set to 8 seconds, gain more movement speed, and slow immunity.

abilities.name: Umbral Trespass
abilities.description: Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.
abilities.active: Kayn infests an enemy champion he has recently damaged, becoming untargetable for up to 2.5 seconds. Reactivate to end this effect early. When Umbral Trespass ends, the target takes 150/250/350 physical damage.
abilities.passive: Shadow Assassin: Gains extra range (both when entering and exiting Kayn's victim) and refreshes The Darkin Scythe on exit. Darkin: Deals percent maximum health damage and heals for a percentage of target maximum health.

kit_1.name: Prowl
kit_1.description: Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Movement Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range. Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Movement Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.

kit_1.name: Javelin Toss
kit_1.description: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.
kit_1.active: Human: Nidalee throws her javelin, dealing 70/85/100/115/130 (+40% Ability Power) magic damage. If it exceeds her basic attack range, it gains damage based on distance flown, up to a potential 210/255/300/345/390 (+120% Ability Power) total damage.

kit_1.name: Bushwhack
kit_1.description: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target.
kit_1.active: Human: Nidalee places an invisible trap that lasts for 2 minutes. The trap triggers when an enemy walks over it, revealing the victim and bleeding them for 40/80/120/160/200 (+20% Ability Power) magic damage over 4 seconds.0 traps may be active at once. (Maximum traps increases at level 6, 11 and 16)

kit_1.name: Primal Surge
kit_1.description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration.
kit_1.active: Human: Nidalee heals target ally champion for 35/55/75/95/115 (+33% Ability Power) to 70/110/150/190/230 (+0) based on their missing health and grants them 20/30/40/50/60% Attack Speed for 7 seconds.

kit_1.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
kit_1.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.
kit_1.active: Human: Nidalee transforms into a vicious cougar with the basic abilities Takedown, Pounce, and Swipe.

kit_2.name: Prowl
kit_2.description: Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Movement Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range. Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Movement Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.

kit_2.name: Takedown
kit_2.description: As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.
kit_2.active: Cougar: Nidalee's next attack deals additional damage, greatly increased on low health targets.

kit_2.name: Pounce
kit_2.description: As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
kit_2.active: Cougar: Nidalee lunges in target direction, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

kit_2.name: Swipe
kit_2.description: As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.
kit_2.active: Cougar: Nidalee claws at enemies in target direction.

kit_2.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
kit_2.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.
kit_2.active: Cougar: Nidalee transforms back into human form. While in human form, triggering a Hunt resets the cooldown of Aspect of the Cougar.

abilities.name: Guerrilla Warfare
abilities.description: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Blinding Dart
abilities.description: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration.
abilities.active: Deals 80/125/170/215/260 (+80% Ability Power) magic damage and blinds the target for 1.5/1.75/2/2.25/2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Move Quick
abilities.description: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Movement Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Movement Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.
abilities.active: Teemo sprints, gaining twice his normal bonus for 3 seconds. This bonus is not lost when struck.
abilities.passive: Teemo's Movement Speed is increased by 10/14/18/22/26% unless he has been damaged by an enemy champion or turret in the last 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Toxic Shot
abilities.description: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.
abilities.passive: Teemo's basic attacks poison their target, dealing 10/20/30/40/50 (+30% Ability Power) magical damage upon impact and 6/12/18/24/30 (+10% Ability Power) magical damage each second for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Noxious Trap
abilities.description: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.
abilities.active: Tosses a stored mushroom as a trap that detonates if an enemy steps on it, spreading poison to nearby enemies that slows Movement Speed by 30/40/50%, reveals them and deals 200/325/450 (+50% Ability Power) magic damage over 4 seconds. Traps last 5 minutes and take 1 second to arm and stealth. If a thrown trap lands on another trap, it will bounce up to 3/4/5 Teemos further before planting.Teemo forages for a mushroom every 0 seconds, but he is only big enough to carry 3 at once.
